benchmark_details.name: REPOEXEC
benchmark_details.overview: REPOEXEC is a benchmark for evaluating repository-level code generation, focusing on executability, functional correctness, and dependency utilization.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to ensure both functional correctness and effective dependency utilization in code generation.

data.source: Auto-generated test cases from large language models and existing repository data.

methodology.calculation: DIR is calculated as the number of dependencies invoked in the solution relative to the total number of provided dependencies.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Pass@1 indicates correct code generation. Higher DIR indicates better utilization of provided dependencies.
methodology.validation: Code functionality is validated through automated test case execution.
